full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'JAM DBYANGS RNAM 'PHRUL STOBS KYI 'KHOR BSKYUNG CHOS RGYAL GONG MA RIM BYON BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL 'DOD DGU'I CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES ^'JAM DBYANGS RNAM 'PHRUL STOBS KYI 'KHOR BSGYUR CHOS RGYAL GONG MA RIN BYON BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL DOD DGU'I CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ,^GNAM BSGOS GONG MA BDAG PO CHEN PO'I GSER GYI BKA'I LUNG GIS MANG GAS PA'I AAM BAN CHEN PO SHE TAR 'GRO DANG STOBS 'PHRUL DU BYUNG BA'I AE PHU WANG RDO RJE RAB BRTAN GYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN CHEN PO'I GSUNG GI BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ,SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA DAM PA'I MTSAN GYIS RJES SU BZUNG BA BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS @004B 'JIGS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS 'JIGS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN,
